title: The Onedin Line. Part 4
brief_description: Master William, son of Elisabeth is now 12 months old. Albert has learned the disheartening truth that Daniel is the father. Outraged he decides to take up an offer of building steamships in America. Small pox is contracted by Master William, as well as some of the passengers of the “Charlotte Rhodes”; will they go into quarantine? The American Civil War means the people there are desperately in need of supplies. Will James make it through the blackade to deliver them? Mr. Baines has been made Captain, and Robert and James make the Onedin Line a public share holding company. The age of steam ships is fast approaching. Should the Onedin Line resist its lure or invest everything? After all, if successful, it could offer James the opportunity to defeat his arch enemy Callon once and for all…
